channel.title: CVE Feed for richardgabriel -- Reusable Text Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for richardgabriel -- Reusable Text Blocks

item.title: CVE-2023-5745|2024-08-02T08:07:32.758Z -- richardgabriel -- reusable%20text%20blocks
item.description: The Reusable Text Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'text-blocks' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 1.5.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with author-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
